alert.note: Alert for Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 10:52PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL STUTSMAN COUNTY THROUGH 1130 PM CDT... At 1052 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Spiritwood, or 9 miles east of Jamestown, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Stutsman County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern North Dakota.
